text: De Ware Tijd (English: The True Time) is one of four daily newspapers in Paramaribo, Suriname. , it was the largest-circulation paper in the country, ahead of its rival, De West, and was described as taking a "staunchly independent stance" politically. It is published in the Dutch language, and privately owned. The Kondreman cartoon is published by the newspaper since 2005. 'Taxi' was published earlier. The newspaper publishes also an online edition. ==References== == External links == * * World Press Freedom Review Category:Newspapers published in Suriname Category:Publications established in 1957 Category:Dutch-language newspapers published in South America
title: De Ware Tijd
